place.name: NORTH RESTON
place.gazetteerText: RESTON (North), a parish in Louth district, Lincoln; 1 mile S E of Legbourne r. station, and 4 S E of Louth. Post-town, Louth. Acres, 703. Real property, £1, 636. Pop., 44. Houses, 8. The manor, with N. R. Hall, belongs to H. Jackson, Esq. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £211.* Patron, the Rev. G. Jackson. The church is good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
